page.title: 10WHIT FRIDAY BAND CONTESTS
page.content: Whit Friday is a local Holiday. All the Churches in the area hold a procession of witness in the morning. Each church engages a {Brass Band}to lead their procession. As there are a good many bands in the valley on this day, open-air {Band {contests}are held in all the towns & villages down the valley.In 1985 there were no less than 15 contests with over 100 bands taking part. Five of the contests are in this block. The Bands are adjudicated on two performances. The first being a short street march where deportment only is judged. In the second & main event, the band stand & play a quick step march & points are awarded for musical ability. As the contests are spread along the valley each band hires a coach to transport them from contest to contest.
